page.title: 04WREXHAM CATTLE MARKET
page.content: There were lots of pens for the animals to stay in. The smell wasn't too nice. They have three betting rings which are quite big. There are lots of people who help herd the cows,sheep and pigs into the pens and out into the awaiting lorries. they make sure that all gates are secure before moving the animals. It is very dangerous because big lorries come in and go out quite fast. The sheds and pens where the animals stay are kept very clean. They are also quite big so that more than one animal can be kept in them. Farmers from all around come here to try to bid their animals and buy something themselves. Sometimes they sell a cow, sheep or pig and buy a different animal. The whole place is very big compared to our normal houses and shops.
